admet_pro.shortDescription: Calculates absorption, distribution, metabolism, excretion, and toxicity (or ADMET) of molecules.

ak_scores.shortDescription: Predicts the exact binding energy between inputted target protein and ligand.

ak_scores2.shortDescription: Predicts the exact binding energy between inputted target protein and ligand.

alphafold2.shortDescription: Predicts the complex structures which consisted with multiple proteins.

alphafold2_multistate.shortDescription: Predicts the structure of target protein.

cells.shortDescription: Searches genomic properties of various cell lines which are used for drug discovery.

chemicalpatents.shortDescription: Searches the patents include chemical compounds.

chemicalpatents_app.shortDescription: Searches the patent which the target compound and its derivative were included in.

compounds.shortDescription: Searches already studied/commercially available chemical compounds and registers them to personal library.

deep_comets.shortDescription: Quantifies the DNA damage in each cell from comet assay image.

docking.shortDescription: Measures the binding strength between target protein and molecules by using Autodock-GPU.

dock_millions.shortDescription: Screens the molecules which have strong binding affinity with target protein among 5 to 50 million of molecule candidates by using molecule modeling simulation and machine learning.

dtiplushit.shortDescription: Searches the compounds which can be bound with protein via artificial intelligence.

genes.shortDescription: Searches the information of genes including kinases genes and GPCR genes.

genomes.shortDescription: Searches the information of association between genes, transcriptome, and proteins.

molfinder.shortDescription: Screens the molecules which have desired properties by using MolFinder based on inputted scaffold.

molfinder_de_novo.shortDescription: Screens the molecules which have desired properties by using MolFinder.

molfinder_pipeline.shortDescription: Generates the molecules which have strong binding affinity with target protein via Molfinder and Docking.

mutant.shortDescription: Predicts the structure of mutated protein based on the artificial intelligence.

protein_property.shortDescription: Analyzes the structural properties such as disordered region or secondary structure by analyzing the sequence of target protein.

protein_sites.shortDescription: Predicts the binding site of target protein.

retrotrae.shortDescription: Predicts the precursors for synthesis of the target compound.

spica.shortDescription: Predicts the physicochemical/biological properties of target compound.

targets.shortDescription: Searches the 3D structure binding possibility of targets for drug discovery and performance of published compounds artificial intelligence models.

templates_app.shortDescription: Screens the template of target protein for the prediction of target protein structure.
